This is a post to explain what is done in the online dashboard to simulate the 
evolution of COVID-19.

This code was developed in R and the dashboard was created using Shiny.

The online simulation tool is available in [this website](https://envbioprom.shinyapps.io/COVID19_Model_KU/)

![Template of the online model simulator for COVID-19](covid19-online-simulator.jpg){#fig-model-simulator}


The model simulator can be seen in @fig-model-simulator.


Get text from here(https://www.ku.ac.ae/khalifa-university-researchers-develop-mathematical-model-to-help-policymakers-and-non-experts-tackle-covid-19-challenges) to adapt it
